verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's able, He's able, I know He's able,
I know my Lord is able to carry me through.
He's able, He's able, I know He's able,
I know my Lord is able to carry me through:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He heals the broken hearted,
He sets the captives free,
He makes the lame to walk again,
And He makes the blind to see.
He's able, He's able, I know He's able,
I know my Lord is able to carry me through.
